name: chapter_4
title: Introduction to Present Continuous Tense
description: This chapter explains the present continuous tense and how it is used to describe actions happening right now.

questions.question: Which sentence is in the present continuous tense?

options.A: She is reading a book now.
options.B: She reads a book every day.
options.D: She will read a book tomorrow.

questions.question: Which of the following is correct in present continuous tense?

options.C: He is going to school now.
options.D: He will go to school now.

questions.question: When do we use the present continuous tense?

options.A: To describe actions happening right now.
